snippet: EQA Partners, a Connecticut-based hedge fund, said on Tuesday that it had hired Randall Kroszner, a former governor of the Federal Reserve whose mandate included bank supervision and regulation.
abstract: EQA Partners, a Connecticut-based hedge fund, said on Tuesday that it had hired Randall Kroszner, a former governor of the Federal Reserve whose mandate included bank supervision and regulation.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Hedge Fund Hires Former Fed Governor Kroszner
